mapper.insert: insert into s_b_abnormal_info (farm_id, house_id, alarm_code, status, start_time, standar_delay, deal_status, deal_delay, deal_time, modify_time) values (#{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{standarDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select farm_id, house_id, alarm_code, status, start_time, standar_delay, deal_status, deal_delay, deal_time, modify_time from s_b_abnormal_info
